org.tal.redstonechips.memory
Class Memory

java.lang.Object
  org.tal.redstonechips.memory.Memory
Direct Known Subclasses:
Ram
public abstract class Memory
extends Object

Represents an abstract memory that can be saved to file.

Author:
Tal Eisenberg

getId

public String getId()
Returns the memory id string

store

public void store(File file)
           throws IOException
Saves the data in this memory. Any data returned by getData() is stored.

Parameters:
file - The file to save to.
Throws:
IOException - When an error occurs wile saving the file.

          throws FileNotFoundException

Parameters:

Throws:
FileNotFoundException - When the file is not found.

public boolean delete()
Deletes the memory file.

Returns:
true if the file was actually deleted.

The memory file of this Memory.

save

          throws IOException
Saves this memory to its memory file (according to its id).

Throws:
IOException

getMemory

public static Memory getMemory(String memId,
                               Class<? extends Memory> type)
                        throws IOException
Retrieves the Memory object for this id or creates and configures a new one if it's not used. If the memory file exists data is loaded from it.

Parameters:
memId - The memory id.
type - Memory class (Ram.class for ex.). Ignored when the memory already exists.
Returns:
A Memory object
Throws:
IOException

getMemory

public static Memory getMemory(Class<? extends Memory> type)
                        throws IOException
Creates a new memory using an unused id.

Parameters:
type - Memory class (Ram.class for ex.).
Returns:
A Memory object
Throws:
IOException

alloc

public void alloc()
Increases the alloc count of this memory by 1.

release

public void release()
Decreases the alloc count of this memory by 1 and release it when the count reaches 0.
